title: Login Failure
summary: Users are unable to log in to the application. Authentication service is returning 500 errors.

title: Payment Delay
summary: Payment processing is experiencing delays. Transactions are taking longer than usual to complete.

title: API Timeout
summary: API requests to the backend service were timing out, causing disruptions for users.

title: UI Bug on Dashboard
summary: Dashboard is displaying incorrect data in the charts section. Visual rendering issue.

title: Database Issue
summary: Database connection pool is exhausted. Application is unable to establish new connections.
